thread.title: Report: Andrew Luck's status seriously in question Sunday vs. Jaguars
thread.title_full: Report: Andrew Luck's status seriously in question Sunday vs. Jaguars

author: Joaquin becoming 'dangerous' Category 4 storm
title: Report: Andrew Luck's status seriously in question Sunday vs. Jaguars
text:
Report: Andrew Luck's status seriously in question Sunday vs. Jaguars theScore 7 hrs ago © Tom Szczerbowski / Getty Images Sport / Getty Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck is legitimately at risk of missing the team's game against the Jacksonville Jaguars on Sunday, according to Adam Schefter of ESPN .
AdChoices Luck missed his second consecutive practice Thursday . He reportedly did throw before practice before the Colts decided to shut him down for the day.
If Luck is unable to play, 40-year-old Matt Hasselbeck will be forced into action.
Another factor in the Colts' decision is that the team faces a short week, playing the Houston Texans on Thursday night in Week 5.
